about_the_game:
The Fences 5 multi-device upgrade DLC enables the software to run on up to 4 additional devices, allowing you to bring the world’s most popular desktop enhancement to all of your Windows 10 and 11 workspaces.

Elevate your desktop experience with Fences, the ultimate tool for organizing your digital workspace. Create a clean, efficient environment by sorting files, folders, and icons into customizable, shaded areas. Access everything you need with a tap of the Windows key + space, thanks to the convenient Peek feature. Personalize your setup further with adjustable Windows key + D actions, choosing how you manage your desktop view with ease.

Fences not only streamlines your current setup but also simplifies future transitions. With its snapshot function, you can effortlessly save and restore your layout when switching to a new monitor or PC. The updated configuration panel ensures a smooth, user-friendly customization experience. Get ready for a clutter-free, productive workspace with Fences, where organization meets innovation.

Top New Features in Fences 5:

  • Chameleon allows you to blend your desktop content into your wallpaper to reduce desktop distractions while maintaining quick access to your files, folders, and apps.
  • Peek toggle on the taskbar enables quick access to the patented Peek functionality making it even easier to stay in your workflow.
  • Taskbar hot corner provides flexibility for accessing Peek with new control options.
  • Advanced deployment tooling designed for enterprise simplifies fleet management with the ability to easily export a configuration and load it on login.
  • Enhancements to the Fences engine to improve performance.
